name: CopperFist!
description:
CopperFist! is a game with a simple premise:

You play as CopperFist, a supervillain whose brain has been taken over by a sentient forehead parasite capable of sprouting it's own eyestalks and a third arm that fires spectral fists out of it. Very simple. As of late however, CopperFist has discovered he CAN'T. STOP. RUNNING!

Uncontrollably run through 5 increasingly difficult levels, timing your jumps perfectly and shooting fists expertly to ensure our valiant anti-hero avoids an untimely death at the hands of spikes, turrets, mines and worst of all, buttons... This will be difficult.

Student project created on the University of Plymouth Game Arts & Design course 2nd year.

Controls:

SPACE - Jump + Double Jump

Mouse - Aim Fist

LMB - Fire Fist
